```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Load APATables2 package
library(APATables2)

# Create data set
d <- matrix(rnorm(20000),ncol = 20)

# Create correlation table
CorTable(d, caption = "Correlation Table of Dataset", notes = "Significant correlations are bolded at $\\alpha = .05$")
```
